name: minecraft-forge-server
description: Minecraft Forge Server 47.4.0 with Docker and Git support

scripts.backup: docker run --rm -v minecraft-forge_minecraft_data:/data -v $(pwd)/backups:/backup alpine tar czf /backup/minecraft-backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).tar.gz -C /data .
scripts.restore: echo 'Usage: docker run --rm -v minecraft-forge_minecraft_data:/data -v $(pwd)/backups:/backup alpine tar xzf /backup/[backup-file] -C /data'

author: Minecraft Server Admin
